title: Official NBA 2K13 Roster 2013-05-11 [MU]
description:
Contains all roster updates for NBA 2K13 also along with the online data.

Instructions: 

Start > Run > Type : %appdata%, then find 2K SportsNBA 2K13Saves , overwrite all the files.
for XP users: C:Documents and Settings[your user name]Application Data2K SportsNBA 2K13Saves
for Vista or Win 7 users: C:Users[your user name]AppDataRoaming2K SportsNBA 2K13Saves
Then go to NBA 2K13 and load it. 

Back from injury:
- New York Knicks: Amar'e Stoudemire [83 overall] 
- San Antonio Spurs: Tiago Splitter [69 overall] 

Added in the game:
- Golden State Warriors: Kent Bazemore with 69 overall rating NEW!


Seed and Enjoy!
